Description.Name: The Scorpion's Nest
Description.Details: Ambitious units of the Santander's Killers emigrated from Sandander's World and thought they'd set up a new branch of operation. Helmar Valasek gave his blessing for them to spread his influence and is raiding Kurita systems for water, grain as well as 'Mech and vehicle parts. {TEAM_EMP.FactionDef.Name} has tasked you with denying his ambitions, permanently. Track down these pirates and finish them for good.

FlashpointShortDescription: The Kurita Representatives needs to stop an ambitious operation by Wilson's Hussars on behest of Helmar Valasek, leader of Santander's Killers. Valasek is trying to expand his operation.
